snippet: The trial of Jerry Sandusky, a former Penn State football coach, began Monday with the prosecution showing pictures of eight boys whom Sandusky is accused of sexually assaulting.
abstract: Trial of Jerry Sandusky, former Penn State assistant football coach, begins in Bellefonte, Pa, with the prosecution showing pictures of eight boys whom Sandusky is accused of sexually assaulting over several; one of his accusers steps into the public for the first time, taking the witness stand and offering several hours of methodically disturbing, often graphic accounts of sexual assault.
lead_paragraph: The trial of Jerry Sandusky, a former Penn State football coach, began Monday with the prosecution showing pictures of eight boys whom Sandusky is accused of sexually assaulting.

headline.seo: Jerry Sandusky’s Child Sexual Abuse Trial Begins
headline.main: Sandusky’s Trial Begins With Graphic Testimony
headline.print_headline: Sandusky’s Trial Begins With Graphic Testimony
